TopicTitle: The Kerbal version of video games

Articles.Content:
Think of a kerbalized version of a famous game

I got one

K-com:snacks unknown:)

Kall of Duty (the only weapons are RPGs!)

Human Space Program (YOU SAW IT COMING DON'T LIE!)

Assassins Kreed (sneak past space stations with tiny ships?)

Rocket_Dogs (Hacking rockets?)

Just Kause 2 (Blow up rockets!)

Grand Keft Auto (Steal rovers...?)

Jeb's Row IV (A version of Saint's Row 4 with Jeb as the star.)

Super Kerbio Bros ()

Kerbemon (Gotta launch 'em all!)

Kerb-Life, Kerb-Life 2, KL2 Ep1 and Ep2 (Gaben's power knows no bounds.... even Kerbals experience Valve Time...)

Elite: Kerberous (For Kerbals who love space battles but don't wish to die in them.)

Man Simulator 2014 (Goats:Humans)

Scott Manley's Take On Duna (Because why not?)

Flappy Neil Degrasse Tyson (Cosmos.)

FarKry 4 (One of Jeb's favorites...)

Left 4 Kraken (4 player co-op Kraken survival horror. With lots of boosters.)

Edited June 27, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h

Minekraft (kinda looks German actually...)

(just realized this should be in games)

slower than light: you pilot a ship built entirely out of SRBs, trying to take out those peskey rebels who wat to 'limit your funding'

kerbonauts: a gme based on the original K-com, saying truer to the original mechanis of the game

starkraft: you are a Kerbal, fighting against the evil forces of the Humans and krackens

bioshok infinite: you find a mysterios floating city, and then you use rockets to smassh it into the ground.

Kerbal Thunder: Like War Thunder But whit Sepatron rockets as... Rockets, and awesome Pew Pew sound effects!

Kerbin's Creed 4: Black SRBB

Just Kause 2 (Blow up rockets!)

Grand Keft Auto (Steal rovers...?)

Grand Theft Rover, obviously.
Super Kerman brothers.
Super Smash Kerbs

Train Kimulator 2014: drive hypersonic, rocket powered space trains all over, making pickups and deliveries ala galaxy express anime.

Kortal 1/2: escape from the clutches of an insane mechjeb unit with your only assistance being...wait for it...ANOTHER INSANE MECHJEB UNIT!

Edited June 29, 2014 by dacamp66
Kivilization.

kluage ink evolved: jeb accidentally releases a nano mechjeb and you have to add parts to it ( like srbs mainsails and fuel tanks to make the nano mechjeb spread quicker) and also make sure there are no re-entry effects so that no one notices it!

and world of karcraft ( use giant rocket assisted swords to blast apart krackens!)

Edited June 29, 2014 by Dreadthrone

Kerban worlds:kernivrse

(Distant worlds: universe

Edited June 30, 2014 by Joshwoo69
Bump and kerbbase kf-9
Grand theft Rover, brilliant

Just Kause 2 (Blow up rockets!)

Didn't think Just Cause 2 was that popular...

RPGsweeper ( There's 50 RPGs with a Kerbal underneath every one, 5 of them are armed and the 45 are empty. Find out which one of hem are and disable them. When you're ready, press Space and see which ones blow up a Kerbal.)
Kerbalsoft Flight Simulator: Fly heavily strutted aircraft that really shouldn't be physically able to fly.Soar the Kerbal Skies with the new InfiniglideÃ¢â€žÂ¢ flight model. Now with TWO airports!!!
PokeRoketto (Pocket rockets! Gotta fly' em all!)
Kuro Kruck Simulator- drive trucks and watch them flip over and explode with the slightest of turning!
